entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [wasm][debugger] Todo in expression evaluation #65864
  • Blazor WebAssembly build: "ImportError: DLL load failed while importing _ctypes: The specified module could not be found." #65859
  • [API Proposal]: Stopwatch.GetElapsedTime #65858
  • [API Proposal]: Marshal.GetFunctionPointerForDelegate() consistent with delegate* #65853
  • .NET Core application fails to find CA cert on Linux even after putting the certificates in ca cert store of openssl #65851
  • [Question] GC pause time is too large for 60 fps #65850
  • [API Proposal]: Extend ServiceBase to allow handling all service control codes #65846
  • Why there is nothing output of finalizer example code in the C# spec? #65845
  • [Mono][Android][x64] JIT.HardwareIntrinsics.X86.*/Jit.Methodical.* tests failed #65840
  • [test][mono][linux][x64] System.IO.Tests.FileStream_DisposeAsync.DisposeAsyncFlushes library test failed #65835
  • More informational error message when parsing number #65834
  • FileStream.Lock(Int64, Int64) always fails on FreeBSD #65831
    7.0.0
  • Regressions in System.Collections.ContainsTrue<String> #65852
  • `Microsoft.Extensions.FileProviders.Physical.Tests` failing with `Unhandled exception. System.IO.DirectoryNotFoundException` #65829
  • [API Proposal]: Make the property `DataContractSerializer.SerializationSurrogateProvider` public #65826
  • Call stack incomplete on Linux in .NET 7 preview 1 #65822
    7.0.0
  • Test failure System.Diagnostics.Tests.ProcessStartInfoTests.TestUserCredentialsPropertiesOnWindows #65820
  • Test failure JIT\\Methodical\\Arrays\\huge\\huge_i4_il_r\\huge_i4_il_r.cmd #65819
    7.0.0
  • `Build Cross OS Linux DAC for Windows` fails to build on CI #65818
  • `System.Text.Json.SourceGeneration.Roslyn3.11.Tests` crashes due to an assertion on linux/arm64/debug #65817

Closed

  • Several classes in System.Private.Xml are creating StringBuilders when formatting simple types like DateTime,TimeSpan #64853
    Future
  • Add stack overflow checking to the interpreter #41673
    Future
  • Assertion failed in System.Net.NetworkInformation.Functional.Tests #65841
  • Regressions in System.Security.Cryptography.Tests.Perf_Rfc2898DeriveBytes #65719
  • The value returned by AsQueryable().FirstOrDefault is different between Net5.0 and Net6.0 #65419
    6.0.x
  • When Regional format is set to Thai LastIndexOf and IndexOf return wrong value in case searched string starts with a special character. #65812
  • Writing unit tests for cultures that does not use hypen '-' as minus sign is a pain in .NET 6.0 #65833
  • DateTimeFormat for the en-AU CultureInfo is incorrect on .NET 5 + 6 #65824
  • Test failure System.Net.Security.Tests.ServerAsyncAuthenticateTest.ServerAsyncAuthenticate_EachSupportedProtocol_Success(protocol: Tls13) #62168
    7.0.0
  • ARM64: loop array indexing inefficiencies #34810
    7.0.0
  • Arm64: Improve code generation for Vector<T> comparision #31685
    Future
  • Non-generic Enum.TryParse(Type, string, out object?) seems to be missing [NotNullWhen(true)]? #65784
  • [Linux] procfs file reads and UnauthorizedAccessException handling #62513
    Future
  • remoteCertificate passed to LocalCertificateSelectionCallback is always null on Windows #63321
    Future
  • [wasm][debugger] method call that skips optional parameters, fails on preview7 #56251
    7.0.0
  • Most of libs partition is not incrementally buildable #49800
    7.0.0
  • System.Xml.EncodingStreamWrapper.ReadBOMEncoding allocates 4 x byte[] due to Stream.ReadByte calls #65786
  • System.Data.SqlClient unloadability #65781
  • Test failure System.IO.Compression.BrotliStreamUnitTests.ReadWrite_Success #65821
  • Process.GetProcessById claims killed process is still alive in .NET Core #63937
    7.0.0
  • ping(6) tests are failing on FreeBSD #63530
    Future
  • [wasm][debugger] Tests randomly fail with `The tasks argument included a null value. (Parameter 'tasks')` #64588
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add a generic overload for `SerializationInfo.GetValue(string name, Type type)` #65783
  • [NativeAOT] Console app NativeAOT published failed #65568
  • Support retrieving the Trusted Issuer List from SslStream #15462
    Future
  • SSL Handshaking on the same stream multiple times without reading/writing does not work correctly on Linux #29595
    Future
  • [System.Text.Json] No way to not encode Emoji characters in json #54193
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Cleanup fragile NGen leftovers #65869
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Make DllImportGenerator emit a GeneratedCodeAttribute on our stubs #65868
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • [release/7.0-preview2][mono][hot reload] Fix sequence point logic for compiler-generated methods in updates #65867
    area-EnC-mono
  • [mono][hot reload] Fix sequence point logic for compiler-generated methods in updates #65865
    area-EnC-mono
  • Fix issues related to JsonSerializerOptions mutation and caching. #65863
    area-System.Text.Json, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, 7.0.0
  • Mark architecture-specific tests with ConditionalFact attributes #65862
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Add tracing to the Linux X509Chain implementation #65860
    area-System.Security
  • [release/6.0] Fix Queryable-to-Enumerable overload mapping logic #65857
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Linq, 6.0.x
  • Add `StringMarshallingCustomType` to `GeneratedDllImportAttribute` #65855
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • Remove WebRequest from SoundPlayer #65854
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • Condition Windows SslCertificateTrust test on Registry value #65848
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Keep Obsolete and EditorBrowsable attributes consistent between ref and src and DefineConst clean-up #65847
    area-Meta, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [wasm][debugger] Support "on frame evaluation" of functions returning char #65842
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Optimize clear_brick_table. #65837
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [wasm] Improved error handling in debug proxy #65828
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Do not copy XState other than AVX when redirecting for GC stress #65825
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Native aot trim annotations experiment #65816
    area-System.Reflection, new-api-needs-documentation

Merged

  • Disable failing EventLogSession.GetProviderNames test #64780
    area-System.Diagnostics.EventLog
  • Swap out a Debug.Fail for a more graceful diagnostic failure. #65861
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • Use ValueStringBuilder to fix allocations in ToString() methods of XdsDateTime and XsdDuration #64868
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • Move the fabricbot config files to the eng folder to avoid changes triggering CI #65856
    area-Meta, 7.0.0
  • Fix Queryable-to-Enumerable overload mapping logic #65569
    area-System.Linq, 7.0.0
  • Improve incremental build times of the libraries subset #64000
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 7.0.0
  • NetworkAddressChange.Unix: fix error checking. #65849
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Refactor script to load NPM modules for NodeJS on Helix #65774
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, 7.0.0
  • Update area-owners and fabricbot to reflect libraries area pod changes #65830
    area-Meta, 7.0.0
  • Add RegexGenerator to System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter. #62325
    area-System.ComponentModel, community-contribution
  • Handle direct addresses for statics in `IsFieldAddr` #64846
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Send CA names on Linux and OSX #65195
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Fix nullability mismatch between `ref` and `src` in `Microsoft.Extensions.Caching.Abstractions` #65804
    area-Extensions-Caching, community-contribution
  • Add [NotNullWhen(true)] to Enum.TryParse overloads #65827
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Unify reading from procfs to get network related information #63696
    area-System.Net, 7.0.0
  • Use SECPKG_ATTR_REMOTE_CERT_CHAIN to retrieve server cert during handshake #65134
    area-System.Net.Security
  • [wasm][debugger] Optional param fix 56251 #64970
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Equalize promoted #64206
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Changes to reduce committed memory: #65367
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [mono] Throw a MarshalDirectiveException when marshalling generic ins… #65743
    area-VM-meta-mono, mono-mirror, community-contribution
  • Process.GetProcessById bugfix #64723
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Use `--emit-symbol-map` to generate a `dotnet.js.symbols` #65162
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • fix few Filesystem tests on FreeBSD #65059
    area-System.IO, os-freebsd, test enhancement
  • Reduce alignment of dispatch maps #65823
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [MonoAPI] Split type and function headers, add MONO_API_FUNCTION macro #65446
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Remove checks and settings for Internal.Runtime.CompilerServices.Unsafe since that type is gone #65809
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • Update GeneratedDllImportAttribute CharSet -> StringMarshalling #65544
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] Misc Debugger improvements (including tests) #65752
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono

Updated

  • [LoongArch64] coreclr-jit directory #62843
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, 7.0.0
  • Disable default marshalling for bool #65749
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • Update windows build machines #65798
    area-Infrastructure
  • [LoongArch64] coreclr/debug and part of inc directory. #62886
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, 7.0.0
  • JIT: Range Checks for "(uint)i > cns" pattern #62864
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Adding Regex.IsMatch(Span) and RegexRunner.Scan() methods #65473
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [release/6.0] [wasm][debugger] Fix (chrome|edge)://inspect for the debug proxy #65219
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 6.0.4
  • JIT: Enable AddrMode for GC types on arm64 #65622
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Improved handling of Antimirov mode in Nonbacktracking Regex engine #65637
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • support WindowsPrincipal in HttpListenerWebSocketContext #65746
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • Reimplement stubs to improve performance #65738
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [DRAFT][PERF][MAUI]dotnet-podcast startup time and size measurements #65813
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Update Roslyn and use new step tracking API in incremental tests. #63978
    area-Infrastructure
  • Publish crossgen for pkg #65520
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [API Implementation]: SafeFileHandle overloads for SetCreationTime, SetLastAccessTime, SetLastWriteTime #60507
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • JIT: Unroll Equals and StartsWith for constant strings and spans. [0..32] chars #65288
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [draft][wasm] JSImport/JSExport prototype #64493
    NO REVIEW, arch-wasm, new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • [API Implementation]: DirectoryInfo.CopyTo / Directory.Copy #62375
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • [PERF][MAUI] Add Maui version info to stored data. Runtime Side #65800
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Add ProcessorCount Event to RuntimeEventSource #65581
    area-System.Diagnostics, 7.0.0
  • Improves handling of env prefixes containing __ #65757
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • Add partial to the enclosing types when running the ConvertToGeneratedDllImport fixer #65452
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Run debugger test in codespace #64746
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Make ObjectConverter use ConverterStrategy.Object #65748
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • [Draft] Remove reference projects from nearly all out-of-band projects #65775
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix non-portable distroRID generation on Alpine Linux #62942
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Add HostApplicationBuilder #65109
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Hosting
  • [release/6.0] Remove OpenSSL error queue checking in SslInitializer #65501
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net, 6.0.4
  • [release/6.0] Build a new version of System.Runtime.Experimental with the correct assembly version #65733
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Runtime, 6.0.4
  • [release/6.0][EventPipe] Fix reverse connection socket leaking to child processes. #65768
    Servicing-approved, area-Tracing-coreclr, 6.0.4
  • Mark SslProtocols.Tls and SslProtocols.Tls11 as obsolete #65773
    area-System.Net.Security, breaking-change, new-api-needs-documentation, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • [Mono] Add SIMD intrinsic for Vector64/128 comparisons #65128
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [Mono] Enable generating SIMD intrinsics for System.Numerics.Vector on Arm64 #65486
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Structs: Do not mark "Hidden buffer pointer" as address-exposed #64130
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add IAsyncEnumerable support to TransformManyBlock #49264
    area-System.Threading.Tasks, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, needs-author-action, 7.0.0
  • CoreCLR runtime tests on Mono Windows x64. #64281
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Memory containment for `FIELD_LIST` operands on x86 #65803
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [iOS] Enable some previously skipped tests #65652
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [tests][eventpipe] Port over Dotnet/Diagnostics to enable eventpipe tests on Android #64358
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • [wasm] emscripten 3.1.4 bump #65703
    * NO MERGE *, area-Build-mono
  • Centralize regex tree analysis for atomic/capture/backtracking detection #65734
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • Use SSA def descriptors in copy propagation #65250
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Avoid Attribute.GetCustomAttributes() returning null for open generic type #65237
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Add missing GC.SuppressFinalize #65766
    * NO MERGE *, area-System.IO
  • Improve ImmutableArray.RemoveRange #65186
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • Add basic fake NTLM server to test NTAuthentication round-trip scenarios #65611
    area-System.Net.Security, community-contribution
  • FileSystem: MoveDirectory: some improvements. #65132
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • [mono] Delete unicode-data.h and related code, cleanup unused eglib functions #65751
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [WIP] ARM64 - Optimizing a % b operations #65535
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [DRAFT] Add MonoApi runtime tests #65221
    * NO MERGE *
  • [crossgen2] Promote single byref aot. #65682
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Enable QJFL and OSR by default for x64 and arm64 #65675
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add a transport package with libmono-profiler-aot.so on Android #65401
    * NO MERGE *, area-Build-mono
  • Revisit `PatternContext<TFrame>.PushDataFrame` nullable annotation #65598
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-FileSystem, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Multiple return types #1856

PullRequests

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Add support for GT_STORE_OBJ and GT_OBJ #1825

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • dotnet new globaljson causes MSB4236: Microsoft.DOtNet.Arcade.Sdk could not be found #24085
  • short URL for "what's new" still pointing to .NET 5 docs #24081
  • The build is failing with the following: #24080

Closed

  • [.NET 6.0] Hot Reload unexpected and unexplained behavior #23917

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove override into preview version of System.Security.Cryptography.ProtectedData #24086
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Switch away from expiring helix queues #24078
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1629805 #23858
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update 6.0.3xx with the 6.0.200 version of files #23977
    Area-Infrastructure
  • fix dotnet run infinite loop by rendering help explicitly #23688
    Area-Tools
  • [WorkloadInstall] Simplify code workload install command line #24028

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-24
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [Proposal]: Checked Operators #4665
    Working Set
  • Switching ReadOnlySpan<char> with constant strings #1881
    Working Set
  • Champion: Simplified parameter null validation code #2145
    Working Set
  • [Proposal]: "file private" visibility #5529
    Needs More Work
  • [Proposal]: Remove restriction that interpolations within a non-verbatim interpolated string cannot contain new-lines. #4935
    Working Set
  • Champion: `base(T)` phase two #2337
    Backlog

PullRequests

Merged

  • Replace spec content with links #5815

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • 'EnableNullableCodeRefactoringProvider' encountered an error and has been disabled #59758
  • Intellisense: "using statement" suggestions are missing for Extension methods for .NET 4.8 Projects when referenced from .NET 6 Projects #59757
  • When using wrong expression in Queryable class file is seen as single expression leading to issues #59756
  • SuppressMessage doesn't work on lambdas #59746
  • Visual Studio hangs when typing """ #59741
  • AnalyzeDataFlow fails #59738
  • `Span<T>` range indexer not be converted to `Slice(int start)` #59732
  • [LSP] Semantic tokens regex colorization incorrect #59731
  • Remove final newline if `insert_final_newline = false` #59729
  • "Convert to file-scoped namespace" adds a blank newline to the end of the document #59728
  • Referencing a project that uses a Source Generator results in Source Generator running twice #59725

Closed

  • GeneratorDriver needs an API to mark a GeneratorDriver as being unable to handle an incremental update #42815
  • IOperation tree change for target-typed new is breaking analyzers in the wild #59171
    17.2
  • RequiresAssemblyFilesAnalyzer throws InvalidCastException #59749
  • IOperation API for attributes #18198
    Backlog
  • Compiler API for getting semantic information about an attribute syntax #44340
  • Source Generators break Sync Namespaces feature #59748
  • Records: warn if either Equals or GetHashCode is redefined, but not both #47513
  • IDE0055 (Fix formatting) errors after upgrading to SDK 6.0.200 (VS 17.1.0) #59637
    17.2

PullRequests

Created

  • Update message to reflect cleanup behavior #59755
    Area-IDE
  • Fix placement of using directives in Sync Namespace refactoring #59754
    Area-IDE
  • Delete Emit2.cs #59753
    Area-Compilers
  • Filter to exact test class names in RunTests #59752
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add missing API to IVSTypeScriptDiagnosticService #59751
    Area-IDE
  • Create attribute default arguments during binding #59750
    Area-Compilers
  • Merge 'dotnet/main' into Utf8StringLiterals #59747
    Area-Compilers, auto-merge, New Feature - Utf8StringLiterals
  • AnalyzeDataFlow: Added missing handling for delegate construction from extension method #59745
    Area-Compilers
  • Bind declarations of checked conversion operators #59740
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - CheckedUserDefinedOperators
  • View call hierarchy fix (#57856) #59739
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Add MetadataAsSource test for records #59736
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Classify pattern variables #59735
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Adjust error wording for members in top-level programs #59734
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Avoid binding lambdas unnecessarily in some error scenarios #59733
    Area-Compilers
  • Allow generate ctor intent to specify accessibility #59730
    Area-IDE
  • Add missing O# context factories #59727
    Area-Interactive
  • Add the fix all provider for fixing all naming violation to feature branch #59726
    Area-IDE
  • Correctly handle a cached solution having frozen generated documents #59723
    Area-IDE
  • Merge main to features/semantic-snippets #59722
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Merged

  • Break out embedded lang classification from semantic classification. #59708
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Finalize New Inline Rename UI #59351
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add telemetry at async completion layer #59694
    Area-IDE, Next
  • [semi-auto-props]: Add more tests (GetMembers, speculative semantic model) #59270
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Revert change to a CompletionItem property name which pythia depends on #59724
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Remove NetFx20 NuSpec #59742
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Bind declarations of unary and binary checked operators #59644
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - CheckedUserDefinedOperators
  • Fix formatting of attributes at end of file #59706
    Area-IDE, Next

Updated

  • Fix more lock contention #59638
    Area-IDE
  • LSP breakpoint placement #59428
    Area-IDE, 17.2
  • Move diagnostic service to LSP layer #59456
    Area-IDE
  • Trigger refactor notify on Renamer.RenameDocumentAsync #55033
    Area-IDE
  • Update source-build dependency to source-build-externals #59549
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Initial sketch of exposing imports from the semantic model #59533
    Area-Compilers, api-needs-work
  • Fixed odd naming suggestions #59674
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Use the same codepath for computing light-bulb actions to determine if hte lightbulb shoudl appear at all. #59599
    Area-IDE
  • Do not retry on Clipboard API for StackTraceExplorer #59658
    Area-IDE
  • [LSP] Cache parsed xml snippets for razor #59605
    Area-IDE, LSP
  • Detect ref assemblies in rebuild #59491
    Area-Infrastructure
  • EditorFeatures.Cocoa: Build with net6.0-macos #59429
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Respect ReportSuppressedDiagnostics option for DiagnosticSuppressor #53045
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, Community
  • Add support for yield return to CompleteStatementCommandHandler #59683
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Produce specific error for misplaced 'record' keyword #59622
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Records
  • Account for possible cache invalidation on a different thread in assert. #59635
    Area-Compilers
  • Make IdeAnalyzerOptions global #59657
    Area-IDE
  • Produce a specific error for 'enum' as constraint #59612
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix 'unnecessary assigment' false posititive for out argument (#58564) #59625
    Area-IDE, Community
  • allow third party codfixers to be run in code cleanup #59631
    Area-IDE
  • Global indentation options #59679
    Area-IDE
  • Copy source file to a temp path instead of using it directly #59685
    Area-IDE
  • Remove unneeded project references in EditorFeatures layer #51471
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Add LSP spell checking support. #59693
    Area-IDE

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • signalr ts client has a dependency on "node-fetch": "^2.6.1" has Governance Alert #40404
  • Using `watch` in `dotnet watch run` causing indented output in terminal #40403
  • Indentation in new Web API project #40401
  • Can't access SignalR logging on Android #40392
  • [Blazor] Razor components give build errors if project includes any reference with "System" as the final part of its namespace #40391
  • Add overload to modify StaticFileOptions for UseBlazorFrameworkFiles #40390
  • UseCorrectCatchAllBehavior breaks optional parameter behavior #40389
  • Renaming the property of an inject service does not work #40402
  • Blazor, InputText does not support changing the EditContext dynamically, when adding forms dinamically #40388
  • IISIntegration tests in VS don't detect changes #40387

Closed

  • Build failed: Validate-DotNet/main real signed, aspnetcore, .NET 6 RC 2, validation-aspnetcore-.NET 6 RC 2 #aspnetcore-109796-.NET6RC2 #36777
  • efcore dependency out of date #36680
  • Build failed: Validate-DotNet/main real signed, .NET 6, validation-aspnetcore-.NET 6, aspnetcore #aspnetcore-109146-.NET6 #36638
  • couldn`t compile asp.net core 6.0 rc1 #36432
  • build.cmd fails on Windows 10 for release/5.0 #35369
  • Blazor Add validation error/message for field #40357
  • Inferring `FromBody.AllowEmptyBehavior = Allow` based nullability information #39754
    7.0-preview3
  • Optional [FromBody] Model Binding is not working #29570
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Could we have Async validation in Blazor? #40244
    Backlog
  • Change "Blazor component" to "Razor component" in a few spots #40344
    .NET 7 Planning
  • After VS Upgrade to 17.1 Hot Reload Issue #40354
  • Publishing App For Blazor WASM (should generate all index file for each routes) #40386
  • Razor view can't render JSON-LD. #40373
  • ProtectedBrowserStorage documentation or source code security algorithm description #40360
  • Perf regression: fortunes_dapper #40184
  • Can't pass headers from browser (typescript) to hub (.NET Core 6) #40307
    7.0-preview3
  • SignalR ESM Bundling fails due to syntax error in HubConnection.js (fix included) #40137

PullRequests

Created

  • Clean up indentation #40400
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Error when Hubs are registered as Singletons #40396
    area-signalr
  • Remove downlevel runtimes from global.json #40393
    area-infrastructure

Merged

  • Bump follow-redirects from 1.14.7 to 1.14.8 in /src/SignalR/clients/ts/FunctionalTests #40176
    area-signalr, javascript, feature-blazor-native-dependencies, 7.0-preview3
  • Allowing empty FromBody parameters input based on nullability #39917

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Label FontSize is ignored when using FormattedText #4902
  • Span bindings are ignored when properties are changed #4901
  • Not possible to include a RazorClassLibrary in a .NET Maui App targetting Android #4898
  • Determine non-HTTP(S) link handling behavior #4897
  • New MAUI project with la fair number of packages build for windows, but exits with "java.exe exited with code 1" #4895
  • Visual Studio 2022 preview dot net maui preview 13 #4894
  • Move everything needed to run a basic .NET MAUI app out of the compatibility DLL #4890
    6.0.300-preview.14
  • [Android] Remove all uses of Styleable arrays inside the .NET MAUI code #4889
    6.0.300-preview.14
  • [Shell] Rework the Shell route parsing code so it performs better #4888
  • [Windows] Button changes TextColor on hover and never restores it back #4887
  • View.Measure returns Size.zero #4880
  • fail to create .NET MAUI app #4876

Closed

  • Blazor WebView exception handling behavior inconsistencies #2598
  • [Bug] Read Blazor Webview unhandled exceptions on iOS/Android #2057
  • [iOS] Convert ShellRenderer to an implementation of IViewHandler #3954
  • Support configurability in opening external URLs #4338
  • [Inconsistency] Blazor Android Webview link with `_blank` target opens in current webview instead of new window #4357
  • I Need SerialPort on Android Device. #4874
  • Impossible publish to folder #4899
  • MauiApp cannot deploy on Windows #4896
  • Remove Blazor Desktop workarounds for iOS/Android Content warnings #3014
  • Razor SDK incompatible with iOS SDK regarding "Content" items #791
    6.0.101-preview.10
  • Use "Razor component" and avoid "Blazor component" #4830
  • Add npm support into .NET MAUI Blazor template #4745
  • GetNativeSize - Gets renderer or handler and calls getdesired size - remove #3949
    6.0.300-preview.14
  • WPF app with BlazorWebView fails to compile the Razor components #3526
  • Maui Essentials will always open settings in split-screen if above Android N #3712
  • [Xaml]Assign to nullable properties #4832
  • dotnet/dotnet exited with code 1 #3744
  • Installing MAUI using the instructions results in errors about missing workloads. #3859
  • Different Tray Size Showing in MAUI Blazor after update #4240
  • [Bug] [Android] Using `ViewCell` with `TapGestureRecognizer` and `DisplayPromptAsync` causes `Java.Lang.IllegalStateException` #4201
  • Issue with debugging Windows app #4239
  • Visual Studio for Windows doesn't connect to mac #4163
  • [Bug] When showing DisplayActionSheet first time, custom control (ViewRenderer) that is placed in same page is recreated #3210
  • [Bug] Button width doesn't size for icon #2356
  • [Webview/Android] blank screen when website have invalid certificate #4811
  • [Bug] OnMeasure not triggered while dynamically add the children #2283

PullRequests

Created

  • Add doc comments for BlazorWebView APIs #4904
    area/blazor 🕸️
  • Essentials.Launcher WIP refactored to interface and singleton #4903
    area/essentials 🍞
  • Move TabbedPageHandler to TabbedViewHandler #4893
  • Refactor VersionTracking into interface #4891
  • [iOS] Custom implementation in SearchBar IsEnabled property #4882
    platform/iOS 🍎, control-entry
  • [iOS] Custom implementation in ScrollView IsEnabled property #4881
    area/layout 🔲, platform/iOS 🍎
  • Ensure InvokeAsync(Func<Task>) is properly awaited #4873

Merged

  • Implement RefreshViewHandler on Windows #3299
    area/controls 🎮, control-refreshview
  • Interfaced handlers for RefreshView and SearchBar #4847
  • Generate the Windows manifests as well #2704
    area/single project ☝️, platform/windows 🪟
  • Blazor Open Links in Browser with Configurability #4645
    area/blazor 🕸️
  • [iOS] Fix issues running on iOS12 #4892
  • [ci] Fix insertion agents #4900
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Wire up build targets to exclude content items from iOS and Android checks #4861
  • Refactor SecureStorage into an interface #4668
    area/essentials 🍞
  • Essentials.FileSystem refactored to interface and singleton #4633
    area/essentials 🍞
  • Move Android Shell to Compatibility #4857
    area/shell 🐢, 6.0.300-preview.14
  • Refactor Screenshot to use an interface #4699
    area/essentials 🍞
  • Moved `GetPlatformSize` logic into a new service #4885
    area/migration 🚚, 6.0.300-preview.14
  • Refactor Essentials.Launcher into interface #4886
  • Fix Razor compilation when running inside WPF's GenerateTemporaryTargetAssembly sub-build #4884
    area/blazor 🕸️
  • Interfaced WebViewHandler, add missing CommandMapper to WindowHandler #4875
  • Interfaced handler for RadioButton #4846
    area/controls 🎮, control-radiobutton
  • Essentials.WebAuthenticator refactored to interface and singleton #4757
    area/essentials 🍞
  • Menubar #4839
  • Interfaced handlers for ShapeView, Slider, Stepper #4865
  • Interfaced handler for Switch and TimePicker #4872
  • Essentials.Magnetometer refactored to interface and singleton #4652
    area/essentials 🍞

Updated

  • Update LICENSE #4905
  • [android] add projects to record AOT profiles #4859
  • [templates] add global.json to pin to .NET 6 #4767
    area/templates 📄
  • Add svg to default copied bundle items for mac/ios #4863

    area/Xaml </>, 6.0.300-preview.14

    area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • [iOS] Implement VerticalTextAlignment property in Label #3714
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-label
